plot: A live-action children's show, the Ghost Busters travel around the globe looking for ghosts. They dispel the ghosts with a weird camera-looking gadget.   Written by  Afterburner
plot_en: A live-action children's show, the Ghost Busters travel around the globe looking for ghosts. They dispel the ghosts with a weird camera-looking gadget.   Written by  Afterburner

title: The Ghost Busters
